DOC.brief_summary: Medium long term efficacy PI-based 2nd line antiretroviral ( ARV ) therapy Cambodia poorly document number patient treatment duration increase . For patient treatment failure , alternative ARV regimen available date . This operational research aim evaluate Cambodian National Program PI-based 2nd line antiretroviral regimen assess proportion treatment failure drug resistance ; identify structural individual factor associate treatment failure ; design alternative salvage ARV regimens .
DOC.brief_title: National Evaluation PI-based 2nd Line Efficacy Cambodia
DOC.criteria: HIV infection age 18 year current PI base 2nd line ARV treatment since least 6 month willing participate consent signature ongoing PI base 2nd line regimen less 6 month time study intake
